nodes.title: Home Open-source IoT Platform - Home Assistant

product.summary: Manage all types of time series data in a single, purpose-built database.

overview.overview: Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Home Assistant is an open-source home automation platform that can integrate various smart devices and services, providing customizable automation scenarios and voice control capabilities to make your home life more convenient, comfortable, and secure.
